structure.unit: LEVY AND ASSESSMENT OF PROPERTY TAXES

law.history: Repealed 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 240, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 371, sec. 1, effective January 1, 1981.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Assessment dates for ad valorem tax on motor vehicles and trailers -- Valuation -- Certification -- Notification of registered owner -- Tax payable to county clerk on or before registration renewal date.
